sentence.Network_en: I think your South American youth has prejudiced you.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为你在南美度过的青少年时代让你产生了偏见。

sentence.Network_en: The South American Indians have been cooking and eating potatoes for well over two thousand years.
sentence.Network_cn: 南美印第安人烹调食用土豆已有2000多年的历史了。

sentence.Network_en: Next week the President will visit five South American countries in six days.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统将在下周的6天时间内访问南美洲的5个国家。

list.abs: 拉丁美洲(south american) 阿根廷共和国/the republic of argentina 玻利维亚共和国/rupublic of bolivia 巴西联邦共和国/federativ.
